nodes.text: Red Seven was the callsign of the seventh member of Red Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this name, and several beings went by the name Red Seven.
Rebel Alliance pilot Elyhek Rue used the callsign during the Battle of Yavin.
Keir Santage flew as Red Seven during the Battle of Endor.

An otherwise unidentified pilot flying as Red Seven with Rogue Squadron in the Battle of Tandankin was shot down by a stormtrooper, but survived to discover a TIE fighter landing strip in the shadow of a local monument.
